meanings.sent2: They were discoing all night long.
meanings.sent3: The discoing duo won the dance competition.
meanings.sent4: His feet were discoing to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent5: The discoing crowd filled the dance floor with energy.

meanings.definition: The act of dancing to disco music.
meanings.sent1: Discoing is a fun way to exercise.
meanings.sent2: The discoing at the club was fantastic.
meanings.sent3: The cat's discoing in the living room made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The discoing of the disco ball reflected colorful lights.
meanings.sent5: Her discoing was so smooth and graceful, like a professional dancer.
